artist: Photographer: Eadweard Muybridge; Publisher: University of Pennsylvania
creditline: Gift of Samuel C. Gale, William H. Hinkle, Albert Loring, Charles M. Loring, Charles J. Martin, and Charles Alfred Pillsbury
description: Jumping a hurdle, saddle, clearing, landing, and recovering, bay horse. From a portfolio of 83 collotypes, 1887, by Edweard Muybridge; part of 781 plates published under the auspices of the University of Pennsylvania
title: Animal Locomotion Plate 637
